mapper.select: SELECT tp.idx as travel_plan_idx, tp.is_public, la.large_area_name, tp.start_date, tp.end_date, tp.days, tp.insert_ts, tp.update_ts FROM tbl_travel_plan tp, tbl_large_area la WHERE tp.large_area_idx = la.idx AND tp.member_idx = #{member.idx} ORDER BY tp.idx DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT
tpd.place_type, a.accom_name, tpd.place_name, tpd.place_seq FROM tbl_travel_plan_detail tpd, tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_accom a, tbl_travel_plan tp WHERE tpd.reservation_idx = r.idx (+) AND r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx (+) AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx (+) AND tp.idx = tpd.travel_plan_idx (+) AND travel_plan_idx = #{travelPlanIdx} AND tpd.day = #{day} ORDER BY tpd.place_seq

SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_point_history) */ idx, member_idx, point_amount, point_reason, is_plus, insert_ts FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{member.idx} OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET point = ((SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND is_plus = 'Y') -(SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND is_plus = 'N')) WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_community) */ idx, img, title, content, insert_ts, update_ts FROM tbl_community WHERE member_idx = #{member.idx} OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT t.idx, t.content, y.title, y.comment_count, t.insert_ts, t.update_ts FROM tbl_comment t, tbl_community y WHERE t.community_idx = y.idx AND t.member_idx = #{member.idx} ORDER BY t.idx DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
